plot: Emily is a single mother struggling to budget for everything that she and her young son, Daniel, need. When Daniel is picked for the school football team, finding him a pair of boots is yet another burden that she must find a solution for.
title: £20.30
plot_es: Emily is a single mother struggling to budget for everything that she and her young son, Daniel, need. When Daniel is picked for the school football team, finding him a pair of boots is yet another burden that she must find a solution for.
